t: DeVotchKa, Mychael Danna - Little Miss Sunshine - Amazon.com Music
s: Don't be fooled by the "various artists" credited as performing on this soundtrack: the CD actually has a rather uniform tone, and mercifully it's a lovely one. Composer Mychael Danna is paired with the Denver band DeVotchKa, who perform his score and offer a few tunes of their own.

t: Mychael Danna, Danna, Mychael - 8mm (1999 Film) - Amazon.com Music
s: Absolutely brilliant score. This is one of the most disturbing movies you'll ever see. Not because of gore or gratuitous sex, but because of the imagery that is invoked through the telling of a story. The success that is achieved is due in part to the brilliant work of Mychael Danna.

t: Mychael Danna, Danna, Mychael - Shattered Glass - Amazon.com Music
s: The original motion picture score is by acclaimed Canadian film composer Mychael Danna, whose credits include The Hulk, Bounce, 8MM, Hearts in Atlantis, and The Ice Storm.

t: Amazon.com: Life of Pi: CDs & Vinyl
s: Canadian-born Mychael Danna is recognized as one of the pioneers of combining non-Western music with orchestral and electronic elements in his film scores. Life of Pi marks his third collaboration with Ang Lee, having previously written the original music for The Ice Storm and Ride with the Devil.
